title: E155 Portfolio
text: Bella Hottenrott is a senior Engineering major at Harvey Mudd College. Her background lies in electrical, computer, and controls engineering. Over the weekends, she and her friends like to go surfing, hiking, and exploring in LA. When she has time to herself, she is almost certainly listening to a podcast, on a run, or making herself a coffee.

title: Blog 0
text:
I am excited to take E155 this semester. I remember seeing the seniors going to lab for this class when I was a freshman. Now I am in my final year and feel I have a strong enough engineering background to take this course. I am excited to challenge myself. Most of all, I am excited to build the resilience and debugging skills that this course develops.
I found Lab 0 relatively easy. It allowed me to reflect on the Git, Linux, and Quarto familiarity that I’ve gained over the past year. I am not sure that I would have been able to set up this portfolio a year ago.
